#summary Golf Markup Language Documentation: simpleType CourseSlope.

== Name ==

*[SCourseSlope CourseSlope]*

  	

===  Super Types ===
{{{
positiveInteger
  |
  +--CourseSlope (restriction)
}}}
----
    

===  Documentation ===
        
			Type to specify a golf course difficulty for handicap calculation.
		
  	
===  Properties ===

  	This component is not nillable.
---- 	
        
===  Model ===

	inclusive lower bound: 55inclusive upper bound: 155

----
    

===  Local Usage ===

    	[CHoleQualificationUSGA HoleQualificationUSGA]
----
    <xs:simpleType name="CourseSlope">  <xs:restriction base="xs:positiveInteger">    <xs:minInclusive value="55"/>    <xs:maxInclusive value="155"/>  </xs:restriction></xs:simpleType>
----
